title: This is Going to Hurt: Secret Diaries of a Junior Doctor
description: Scribbled in secret after endless days, sleepless nights and missed weekends, Adam Kay's This is Going to Hurt provides a no-holds-barred account of his time on the NHS front line. Hilarious, horrifying and heartbreaking, this diary is everything you wanted to know - and more than a few things you didn't - about life on and off the hospital ward.This edition includes extra diary entries and a new afterword by the author.
author: Adam Kay
